text: Mom and Dad Save the World is a 1992 American science fiction comedy movie directed by Greg Beeman and starring Teri Garr, Jeffrey Jones, Jon Lovitz, Thalmus Rasulala, Wallace Shawn, Eric Idle. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was a box office bomb. == Other websites == * * Category:1992 science fiction movies Category:1992 comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Greg Beeman Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about royalty
title: Mom and Dad Save the World
